name: petio
description: Petio is a request management tool integrating with Plex and Overseerr to allow users to request media content. It automates approval workflows and supports multiple media backends.
features: Media Requests: Users can search and request movies or TV shows to be added to your Plex library through an intuitive interface.
Approval Workflows: Configure automatic or manual approval processes for media requests based on user roles and quotas.
Plex Integration: Direct integration with Plex Media Server for authentication, library management, and content availability checking.
Overseerr Compatibility: Works alongside Overseerr to provide alternative request management with different features and UI.
User Management: Control access and permissions with user accounts, roles, and request limits for fair resource allocation.
Request History: Track all media requests with status updates, approval history, and fulfillment tracking.
Notification System: Alert users when their requests are approved, denied, or available in the library.
Search Integration: Search across multiple media databases to find and request content with metadata and artwork.
Mobile Responsive: Optimized interface works seamlessly on mobile devices for requesting content on the go.
Request Quotas: Set limits on how many requests users can make per time period to manage library growth.
Quality Profiles: Configure preferred video quality and format settings for automated media downloads.
Issue Reporting: Users can report problems with existing media for re-download or quality improvement.
